select user_sn, user_id, user_nm, nick_nm, profile_img_url, login_se, to_char(rgtr_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as rgtr_dt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY user_sn DESC) AS RNUM from brew.brewsignin where 1=1
and auth_cd = #{authCd}
and user_id like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' or user_nm like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' or nick_nm like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
order by user_sn desc
